about_the_game: Make My Car - will take you into the automotive world. Starting in a small, old factory, you are given a golden opportunity to become a part of somethin big. Your uncle Bort, a renowned engineer and inventor, starts sending you unique car blueprints that, due to their complexity and abstract nature, are not suitable for large companies. However, for your small company, these blueprints could be the key to success. Sometimes you'll have to finish them. Sell cars, expand your factory, hire staff, and develop innovative models to dominate the automotive market.
detailed_description: Make My Car - will take you into the automotive world. Starting in a small, old factory, you are given a golden opportunity to become a part of somethin big. Your uncle Bort, a renowned engineer and inventor, starts sending you unique car blueprints that, due to their complexity and abstract nature, are not suitable for large companies. However, for your small company, these blueprints could be the key to success. Sometimes you'll have to finish them. Sell cars, expand your factory, hire staff, and develop innovative models to dominate the automotive market.
name: Make My Car

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or similar
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 700 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 3.3GHz or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 series or similar
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
